tool.name: demo3D01
tool.help:
Synthesizes one 3D image with nuclear, cell shape, and vesicular channels from all vesicular object models (lysosomes, mitochondria, nucleoli, and endosomes) with sampling method set to render vesicular objects as ellipsoids without convolution. The model was trained from the Murphy Lab 3D HeLa dataset.
Output ------
* a zip file with six TIFF files (nuclear, cell shape, lysosomal, mitochondrial, nucleolar, and endosomal channels)
